body.p: Floyd and Kenton county, Kentucky, politician and attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Rhoda H. Harris. Father of Letitia Harris, Louisa Harris, Helen Harris, Thomas Harris, Bob Harris, and Jerry South Harris. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1834, 1835, and 1838. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1843 to 1847. Attorney in Kenton County in 1850. Attorney in Kenton County in 1860.
